title: Assignment 1: Data, Visualization, and Housing
description: An analysis of housing data using various visualization techniques to uncover trends and insights in the real estate market.

title: Assignment 2: Exploratory Visual Analysis
description: A project focused on using exploratory data analysis methods to visually investigate complex datasets and identify patterns.

title: Assignment 3: Visualization Critique & Redesign
description: Critiquing existing visualizations and applying design principles to improve their effectiveness and clarity.

title: Assignment 4: Persuasive or Deceptive Visualization?
description: Exploring the ethical implications of data visualization by distinguishing between persuasive and deceptive practices.

title: Climate Spiral Visualization
description: An animated representation of global temperature changes over time, illustrating the progression of global warming. ([NASA Scientific Visualization Studio](https://svs.gsfc.nasa.gov/5190/))

title: ChronoZoom: Interactive Timeline of the Universe
description: A free, open-source project that visualizes time from the Big Bang to the present day, helping users grasp the concept of 'Big History'. ([Microsoft Research](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/project/chronozoom/))

title: DataViva: Brazilian Economic Data Visualization
description: A platform that provides visualizations of Brazilian economic data, including exports, industries, and occupations, through interactive applications.

title: Phoenixmap: Visualizing 2D Spatial Distributions
description: An abstract approach to visualize multiple spatial distributions simultaneously, aiding in the comparison of 2D spatial data.

title: TMAP: Visualizing High-Dimensional Data as Trees
description: A method to represent large, high-dimensional datasets as two-dimensional trees, preserving both global and local features for human interpretation.

title: COVID-19 Mobility and Sociability Trends
description: An interactive tool to evaluate mobility and sociability trends during the COVID-19 pandemic, assisting in understanding the impact on transportation systems.

title: Data Sketches: Creative Data Visualizations
description: A collection of 24 unique data visualization projects exploring various topics, created by Nadieh Bremer and Shirley Wu.

title: Scientific Visualization: Applications in Natural Sciences
description: Utilizing visualization techniques to represent scientific data, aiding in the exploration and understanding of complex natural phenomena.
